name: Hackbot (dreaman)
description:
This Game was made in Game Maker 6, back in 2013.

It is the first Prototype of "Hackbot", which i kept working on for years, and i still didnt finish it. 

This game concept is maybe the first and biggest step i ever took towards becoming a professional Game Designer, so it will forever have a special place in my heart.

I can share this Protoype with you tho, and this will hopefully also motivate me to release the full game!

Enjoy! :)
